Message.Title: The KO play
Message.Msg: I entered a swing trade on KO @ 40. and just don't get it. It sells off for no reason. Low GDP does not effect Coke sales. Even during bad times Iv never heard some one order a Jack n Pepsi or a rum n RC. In China people drink Coke because it gives them face. Down China economy up Coke sales. No respectable Chinese wants their friends to think they're poor. Todays gain loss is just stupid.

Message.Title: No Really
Message.Msg: What the H E double L is going on?

Topic.Title: JULY : Coca-Cola Blowout Earnings; Dividend Increase; Share Buyback:

Message.Msg: calm before the storm : After Earnings : Easy : 45$
Is there any good reason why KO is in the red today?
Nothing in particular. Just a VERY short period (and move) in a VERY volatile market. Don't sweat these kind of moves.

Message.Title: ko
Message.Msg: i think buffet is getting ready to buy

Not that I'm panicking it just doesn't make sense to Sell off for no reason when the market is at +145.? C was the only red on my board and the only news was the launch of what looks like a good product. Except there should be some Coke a Cola red on that label.

maybe next week announcement ; increased stake in Coca-Cola. as this Friday closes out first 1/2 of the year. To be honest; I have been studying the TAPE and it seems a lack of buyers in the past 3 weeks...since june 7th. Seems some BIG-Holder of "KO" was trimming there holdings and on each "ask" ...someone accumulated.

Message.Msg: I have been studying the TAPE and it seems a lack of buyers in the past 3 weeks...since june 7th. Seems some BIG-Holder of "KO" was trimming there holdings and on each "ask" ...someone accumulated. Message.Title: My Analysis for July on: Coca-Cola : "KO"
Message.Msg: Folks : All the excitement starts on Monday July 1st: - New Buyers : portfolio dressing. -Wouldn't be surprised if WARREN announces increased stake in "KO" -Earnings on July 16th : Blowout Earnings : - Possible announcement stock buyback: - may surprise with a Dividend Increase: - New Markets ; New products - Breakout profits in China - With "Dow" @ all-time High heading to 16000+..... - "KO" heads to $45+.
